00025 #ifndef __MeshFileFormat_H__
00026 #define __MeshFileFormat_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00029 
00030 namespace Ogre {
00031 
00048     enum MeshChunkID {
00049         M_HEADER                = 0x1000,
00050             // char*          version           : Version number check
00051         M_MATERIAL            = 0x2000,
00052             // char* name 
00053             // AMBIENT
00054             // Real r, g, b
00055             // DIFFUSE
00056             // Real r, g, b
00057             // SPECULAR
00058             // Real r, g, b
00059             // SHININESS
00060             // Real val;
00061             M_TEXTURE_LAYER    = 0x2200, // optional, repeat per layer
00062                 // char* name 
00063                 // TODO - scale, offset, effects
00064         M_MESH                = 0x3000,
00065             // M_GEOMETRY chunk
00066             M_SUBMESH             = 0x4000, 
00067                 // char* materialName
00068                 // bool useSharedVertices
00069                 // unsigned short numFaces
00070                 // unsigned short* faceVertexIndices ((v1, v2, v3) * numFaces)
00071                 // M_GEOMETRY chunk (Optional: present only if useSharedVertices = false)
00072 
00073             M_GEOMETRY          = 0x5000, // NB this chunk is embedded within M_MESH and M_SUBMESH
00074                 // unsigned short numVertices
00075                 // Real* pVertices (x, y, z order x numVertices)
00076                 M_GEOMETRY_NORMALS = 0x5100,    //(Optional)
00077                     // Real* pNormals (x, y, z order x numVertices)
00078                 M_GEOMETRY_COLOURS = 0x5200,    //(Optional)
00079                     // unsigned long* pColours (RGBA 8888 format x numVertices)
00080                 M_GEOMETRY_TEXCOORDS = 0x5300,    //(Optional, REPEATABLE, each one adds an extra set)
00081                     // unsigned short dimensions    (1 for 1D, 2 for 2D, 3 for 3D)
00082                     // Real* pTexCoords  (u [v] [w] order, dimensions x numVertices)
00083             M_MESH_SKELETON_LINK = 0x6000,
00084                 // Optional link to skeleton
00085                 // char* skeletonName           : name of .skeleton to use
00086             M_MESH_BONE_ASSIGNMENT = 0x7000
00087                 // Optional bone weights
00088                 // unsigned short vertexIndex;
00089                 // unsigned short boneIndex;
00090                 // Real weight;
00091 
00092                 
00093 
00094 
00095     };
00096 
00097 } // namespace
00098 
00099 
00100 #endif
